nodes.text: The Navlaas Triad was a trio of space stations that orbited the gas giant Navlaas in the Inner Rim. Originally a collection of droid-operated clouzon gas mining facilities, the Triad's parent company came under the scrutiny of the Galactic Empire, and eventually the stations were left in the hands of smugglers and illegal racing syndicates. Operating as out-of-the-way refueling stations, the Navlaas Triad was later visited by the New Republic's Vanguard Squadron on a mission to extract an informant from Triad Station Daralto.
